{"id":941887305,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1682824644,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/941887305/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Number of Fish in a Grid","memory":"42.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int findMaxFish(int[][] grid){\n        boolean[][] vis= new boolean[grid.length][grid[0].length];\n        int ans=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<grid.length;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<grid[0].length;j++){\n                if(grid[i][j]>0 && !vis[i][j]){\n                    ans=Math.max(dfs(grid,vis,i,j),ans);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n       return ans; \n        \n    }\n    public int dfs(int[][] grid,boolean[][] vis,int r ,int c ){\n        if(r<0 || c<0 || r>=grid.length|| c>=grid[0].length || vis[r][c] || grid[r][c]==0){\n            return 0;\n        }\n        vis[r][c]=true;\n        int curr=grid[r][c];\n        \n        curr+=dfs(grid,vis,r,c+1);\n        curr+=dfs(grid,vis,r,c-1);\n        curr+=dfs(grid,vis,r+1,c);\n        curr+=dfs(grid,vis,r-1,c);\n        return curr;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-number-of-fish-in-a-grid","has_notes":false}
